title.rendered: 20 Best Night Clubs Near me in Bangalore

content.rendered:
Bangalore is the silicon city of India. This IT hub is known for its great employment opportunities and also for being the startup central. This city is thronged by entrepreneurs, college-goers, and mostly young people. The thumping nightlife of Bangalore offers the perfect work-life balance people look for. When it comes to nightclubs and cafes, Bangalore is not behind. From theme-based to ladies’ nights, from quirky decorations to many more, one cannot get bored even for a single night in Bangalore.

If you are in Bangalore and looking to beat the work blues then check out these 20 best nightclubs in Bangalore.

List of 20 Best Night Clubs Near me in Bangalore

  1. XU
  2. Toit
  3. Prost
  4. Skyye
  5. Pebble
  6. Loft 38
  7. Warehouse
  8. The Loveshack
  9. The 13th Floor
  10. The Byg Brewski
  11. The Black Rabbit
  12. High Ultra Lounge
  13. The Sugar Factory
  14. Xtreme Sports Bar
  15. The Humming Tree
  16. Vapor Pub and Brewery
  17. Ice Bar and Teppanyaki
  18. Hard Rock Cafe Bangalore
  19. NoLimmits Lounge and Club
  20. Happy Brew Bar and Kitchen

1. NoLimmits Lounge and Club


Looking for a place with an awesome selection of drinks and good Bollywood music? Your search stops here. The NoLimmits lounge and club is just the place for you. Get your Ganga together and head over to NoLimmits. The place where drinks flow freely and the music never stops. A great place for birthday celebrations, bachelor/bachelorette parties or just to get rid of mid-week blues. The seating here is perfect for you to sit back and relax after a foot-thumping night.

  • Address: Allied Grand Plaza, 2nd Floor, 8, Magrath Rd, Above Nalli Silks, Opposite Garuda Mall, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025
  • Timings: 11:30 Am to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.1
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

2. Skyye


Located in one of the most upscale malls of Bangalore in UB city, Skyye is a cool hangout spot in Bangalore. Deemed as one of the best nightclubs in Bangalore, Skyye is worth a visit even if you are travelling here. The lit dance floor, an electrifying ambiance, and delicious food choices makes this place different from the rest. Other than the spectacular food and drinks menu, Skyye offers a magnificent skyline view of the city.

  • Address: 24, 16th Floor, Uber level, Canberra Block, UB City, Vittal Mallya Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
  • Timings: 05:30 Pm to 11:30 Pm
  • Zomato Rating: 4.3
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

3. The Byg Brewski


If you are a party freak in Bangalore, then partying at the Byg Brewski should definitely be on your agenda. This nightclub has hosted plenty of people to celebrate their night outs and numerous small and big events. The club has an incredible environment, moody lighting, and an overall very happening ambiance. The best part about the club is the interesting koi fish pond. You can either choose to sit back and relax by the koi fish pond or have the time of your life dancing the night away. The Byg Brewski has provision for both.

  • Address: Sothern Asia Bible College, Byrathi Village, 22, 1st Main Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560077
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.5
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

4. Ice Bar and Teppanyaki


Adding to the sophisticated vibe of Bangalore is the Ice bar and Teppanyaki’s continental vibe. The ambiance creates such a vibe that goes perfectly with the incredible food and drinks menu. Famous for being one of the best clubs in Bangalore, the bar also boasts of a lit pool. Let yourself loose at the ice with some foot-tapping music, DJ mixes, and a Vibey environment. To avoid all the rush or just to be sure of your seats, make your reservations here beforehand.

  • Address: Taj Mg Road, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Opposite 1 MG – Lido Mall, Yellappa Garden, Yellappa Chetty Layout, Sivanchetti Gardens, Halasuru, Karnataka 560001
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.6
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

5. Loft 38


If you are a dancer or a closet dancer, then Loft 38 is just the club in Bangalore you need to be. Considered to be one of the most happening places in Bangalore for dancers, this place is a must-visit. Get tipsy drinking and bring your foot-tapping dancing shoes along for a memorable time with your friends and family. If you get tired of the dancing gorge on delicious cuisines ranging from continental and Chinese to Indian etc. The purple neon bulbs of the club will ignite a party vibe within you.

  • Address: Shop No, 763, 100 Feet Rd, next to Xtreme Sports Bar, HAL 2nd Stage, Appareddipalya, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038
  • Timings: 11:30 Am to 11:30 Pm
  • Zomato Rating: 4.2
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

6. Vapor Pub and Brewery


If you are looking for the opposite of chill and relaxing vibes, then you must make your way to Vapor pub and brewery. This has to be one of the most famous pubs and bars in Bangalore which caters to a crowd that is ready to party till the break of dawn. The long waiting lines outside the club are a testament to its reputation and popularity. The delicious handcrafted beer selection along with a colorful food menu makes the wait worth every second. The DJ is aware of what the crowd loves and all the trending songs. So put on your dancing shoes and party like no one’s watching.

  • Address: 773, 100 Feet Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.2
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

7. Toit


Toit brewpub is one of a kind in every sense. If you enjoy a cold one every now and then, then Toit is just the place for you. The special 6 delectable brews that Toit Bar and Club offers are truly worth a visit. If you wish to party all night with your friends and loved ones then head on to Toit right now. Here party vibes are represented at their best. The basmati blonde here is a must-try at Toit. Sold exclusively during Christmas another drinks that should be tried is the ginger and cinnamon-infused brew. The ambiance here is British-themed. If you are going there with the intention of partying your heart out then you must try out all the 6 flavors.

  • Address: Indiranagar, 100 Feet Rd, Near Drops Total Spirites, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038
  • Timings: 08:30 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.8
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

8. The Black Rabbit


If it is a rustic ambiance that you love while drinking to your heart’s content, then the black rabbit should definitely be visited. If you know how to enjoy a good drinking session with your buddies, then you must head on to the black rabbit. The place is known for offering some of the best beer brands and signature cocktails selection. The combination of smoked salmon and blood orange mimosa is a winning combination at this fantastic lounge and bar. The posh and sophisticated-looking interiors also make for the perfect insta-worthy night out with your group of friends.

  • Address: 770, 12th Main Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038
  • Timings: 08:30 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.3
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

9. Prost


No matter how many times you visit Prost, each visit will be as exciting as the other. The numerous types of draft beers and lagers will make your visit worth it. What makes prost different from other lounges, is the availability of pilsners that carry a distinct aromatic flavor and fragrance. Prost is all about offering good food and great beer. So if it is a chill night that you are looking for after a long, hard day at work, then the prost is the place to be. This brewpub offers moody lighting, a comfortable seating arrangement, and a constant chilled-out vibe that will make you want to unwind, sit back and have a beer or two.

  • Address: 21, ITPL Main Rd, Garudachar Palya, Mahadevapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560048
  • Timings: 08:30 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

10. The Loveshack


Why go to Goa for a beach party when you can get it at the Loveshack in Bangalore? If the weather seems nice and you are looking for a nice terrace location to chill out with your buddies then head on to Loveshack right now. The cool cabanas in the club, the rooftop location, good food, and a huge selection of booze will guarantee that you have a night that you will not forget anytime soon. The club witnesses a very strong base of loyal customers who keep coming for more. Karaoke nights are reserved for Wednesdays when you can sing your heart out and dance till your feet hurt. The Loveshack is also a much-preferred location for various live performances and acts like musicals and dances.

  • Address: 5th Floor, 541-543, 100 Feet Rd, Amarjyoti Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071
  • Timings: 08:30 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.9
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

11. Pebble


If it is a themed cafe/lounge that you are looking for then the pebble jungle-themed lounge is just up your alley. The bartenders are professionals and put up quite an interesting show for the people. The extensive food menu including everything from North Indian to continental and Chinese foods is the highlighting factor here. Enjoy your evening feeling like you are sitting amidst nature and real jungle surroundings. The lush surroundings will make you forget that you are in a metro city like Bangalore. The crowd is elegant and the service is on point. Say goodbye to the hustle of the chaotic city life and spend some soothing time with good food, good music, and good services.

  • Address: Princess Academy, Palace Grounds, 9, Bellary Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560080
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.1
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

12. XU


Situated in the posh and sophisticated 5-star hotel of the Leela Palace, XU is a classy lounge famous for its ambient vibe and peaceful atmosphere. The USP of this club is live entertainment and awesome bartenders. The place is huge so it can easily host a number of different parties or functions. The live sports screening is another added factor in making this place an iconic hangout spot for people of every age and liking. The place is also known for its indoor seating arrangement, romantic dining area, and also for being disabled-friendly. A great place to just chill your nights out amongst great music and thumping vibes.

  • Address: 23, Level C, The Leela Palace Kodihalli, HAL 2nd Stage, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.9
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

13. Warehouse


Staying true to its name, the warehouse lounge in Bangalore is a unique hangout spot. Looking for a unique place for a date or craving for a different vibe than the ones you are used to? The warehouse lounge is just the spot for you. Ambiance will immediately remind you of being inside an industrial warehouse. The area is made in the style of a typical industrial shed complete with broken walls, exposed bricks, and yellow bulbs. The warehouse is mainly famous for its finger food and continental menu selection. To accompany your drinks the lounge offers great music being played by equally awesome DJs.

  • Address: 242, 80 Feet Road Indiranagar, Bengaluru 560038 India
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

14. High Ultra Lounge


This lavish and Ultra Posh lounge is all about fine dining and delicious cocktails. If you are at your wits end regarding the perfect date spot then the high Ultra Lounge is a place that you should definitely consider. Offering a view for over 430 feet, the high Ultra Lounge is also known for being the highest lounge in South India. The menu consists of a delectable selection of Thai, Chinese, Japanese and Korean cuisines. Get a bird’s eye view of the IT city Bangalore below while sipping on delectable cocktails and enjoying some of the finest Asian menu food. Wondering where to spend that special day with your loved one? Then the high Ultra Lounge is here to put all your arguments to rest.

  • Address: 26/1, Rooftop, World Trade Center, Dr Rajkumar Rd, Malleswaram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560055
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.3
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

15. Happy Brew Bar and Kitchen


On first look, the happy brew bar and kitchen will feel and look like a casual chill spot for you and your crew. And rightly so. This place offers the perfect ambiance for you to kick back a couple of beers and cocktails along with a couple of delicious snacks. The teriyaki chicken, spicy corn, and jade chicken deserve a special mention. Known for its fairly priced beers, live entertainment, and no cover charge, this place is perfect for college-going kids and working professionals looking to save some money while also having a memorable time with the gang.

  • Address: 40, 4th B Cross Rd, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala Industrial Layout, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 12:30 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.6
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

16. The Sugar Factory


Located within the 5-star premises of Le Meridien Hotel in Bangalore, the sugar factory is an iconic hangout spot for people who love spending their weekends in a sophisticatedly chilled-out manner. A bit on the expensive side, this place is a great way of spending those special moments and to mark those special milestones in life like anniversaries or birthdays. The wait staff is courteous which goes perfectly with the classy ambiance. The music played here is awesome and a special mention of the food here deserves much appreciation. The dance floor here will make you feel like dancing to awesome tunes even if you are not a dancer. Situated a little bit on the outskirts of the city, a visit to the sugar factory will definitely be a wholesome experience.

  • Address: Le Meridien Hotel, 28, Sankey Road, Palace Cross Rd, Vasanth Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560052
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 12:30 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

17. The 13th Floor


The 13th floor in MG road is all about sweeping high-rise views, good vibes, and a romantic terrace seating arrangement. Serving delectable North Indian, Chinese, and other Asian cuisines, the 13th floor is a lounge-like no other. Imagine sipping on tasty cocktails and dining on a mouth-watering selection of food while watching the sunset on the horizon seems like a dream. Some of the must-have dishes here are crispy prawn, Thai Crispy Chicken, tandoori mushrooms, and the famous chicken platter. The magnificent view and the food have gathered a loyal customer base where people love coming back. The perfect vibe to chill out and relax for the day. The staff is very courteous and the music is kickass that attracts the right kind of crowd. So if you are looking for a place that re-defines style, elegance, and quality then this is the place for you.

  • Address: Tower-B, 13th floor, 84, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 12:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

18. The Humming Tree


Boasting an extensive pocket-friendly menu, the humming tree is as quirky as its name. Visit there during the weekends and you will understand the real meaning of dancing and partying like no one’s watching. Located in a very posh locality this place offers a peaceful homely yet very thumping vibe. The live musical sessions had the crowd grooving and humming. Sipping on delicious drinks while also gorging on a delectable selection of foods, is what makes the humming tree truly one of a kind. The exciting dance musical sessions and an epic crowd will have your feet thumping for hours even after you leave the club.

  • Address:949, 12th Main Rd, Sodepur, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 12:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.1
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

19. Xtreme Sports Bar


If it is unapologetically delicious food that you are looking for, then Xtreme Sports Bar and Grill is just the place for you. The menu is packed with delectable Chinese, North Indian, and fast food selection that is delicious and super wholesome at the same time. The variety of cocktails with your favorite Chilli Chicken, onion rings, and desserts are a must-try at this happening sports bar. The live sports screenings of various games accompanied with a friendly bartender and a rich variety of beers make this place definitely worth a visit.

  • Address: 75, Play Arena, Kasavanahalli, Central Jail Road, Sarjapur Road Near Total Mall South Bangalore 560035
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.2
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

20. Hard Rock Cafe Bangalore


Hard rock cafe is a very famous name all over the world. The freshly handcrafted beer service at this cafe accompanied with vibey live music and awesome cuisines selection is the signature of this cafe. Located inside the park square mall, and famous for offering a huge selection of specially made burgers and other such fast foods, the hard rock cafe in Bangalore is a hub for people who love good food and drinks to go along with their favorite music. The vibe here is that of an old-school-style cafe/bar and the walls here are plastered with posters and framed pictures of rock and roll legends.

  • Address: 40, St Marks Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
  • Timings: 12:00 Am to 01:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.7
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

These are the 20 best nightclubs in Bangalore. There are many more nightclubs, bars, and pubs here but these are the 20 of the best ones here.

His videography and photography reflect his urge to help fellow travelers who embrace the pleasures and perils of journeys just for the sense of adventure and newness they bring to our otherwise monotonous lives.
